I've implemented a PacMan clone in which I've employed NEAT to evolve 
PacM=
an's AI.  So far the results have been resonably good, and I hope 
to put t=
he code in a SourceForge project, if anyone is interested.

I've used Mat B=
ucland's implementation of NEAT for Windows, but I've 
been told that it ma=
y be somewhat buggy.  If anyone has any feedback 
on the suitability of thi=
s code or of modifcations or alternatives, 
please let me know.

And, I hav=
e to say, very nice work Dr. Stanley.  

-Kirk
